message.short: Unable to associate parameters. The Machine does not exist.
message.long: Unable to associate parameters. Machine %EquipmentNId% does not exist.

message.long: Unable to associate parameters. Equipment %EquipmentNId% is not a Machine.

message.long: Unable to associate parameters. The association between Machine %EquipmentNId% and Automation Node Instance %AutomationNodeInstanceNId% does not exist.

message.long: Unable to associate parameters. Automation Node Instance %AutomationNodeInstanceNId% does not exist or is not in status Activated.

message.long: Unable to associate parameters. Automation Node Instance Parameter %AutomationNodeInstanceParameterNId% is not related to Automation Node Instance %AutomationNodeInstanceNId%.

message.long: Unable to associate parameters. Automation Node Data Type %ATNDataType% does not match with the following discrete Data Types: %DSDataTypeList%.

message.long: Unable to associate parameters. Material Parameter %MaterialParameterNId% does not exist.
